thread.title_full: Florida man with teddy and lotions 'tried to abduct teen' | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Florida man with teddy and lotions 'tried to abduct teen' | Daily Mail Online
text: The sickening moment a Florida man 'who tried to abduct a teen as she walked to her school bus' is caught by police with a teddy bear, lotions and his pants unzipped Police say James Buchanan, 26, grabbed the girl as she was walking to school He put his hand over her mouth but she bit down and screamed, police said She called in a description to 911 and Buchanan was arrested soon after He exited his car with his pants open - and had a teddy, creams and lotions Police had to get a warrant to unclench his hand - and found a mark, they said Published: 07:12 GMT, 17 February 2017 | Updated: 11:21 GMT, 17 February 2017 79 shares
